meaningMnemonic: The kanji means <kanji>storehouse</kanji>, and the vocab is also <vocabulary>storehouse</vocabulary>! Specifically, this usually refers to a traditional Japanese storehouse, which is typically a two story building used to store personal property or merchandise.
readingMnemonic: What do you put in your <vocabulary>storehouse</vocabulary>? Nothing that nice. Just your totally <reading>cra</reading>shed (くら) car. So sad, it was a nice car, too and now it's all crashed and stored in your warehouse.
